name: 1-2-Jump
description:
Jump over the lilypads to avoid falling into the water! Each jump can be decisive, so think carefully about how much you want to jump. It seems a simple task, but there is no time to hesitate - a hungry crocodile is catching up from behind!

Hurry up to save the lovely frog!

1-2-Jump it's a hypercasual mobile game, for easy playing when you have free 5 min
